page.title: 19ENTERTAINMENT 2
page.content: {Millbrook-Plouider}(Brittany).Twinning started 1979,with formal twinning ceremonies in Plouider at Easter, Milbrook at Whitsun,through the co-operation of Millbrook Parish Council and the Mayor and people of Plouider.It is an annual exchange -Easter to Plouider and Whitsun for Millbrook Carnival Weekend.Festivities include football matches,Carnival participation,skittles and social meetings at the football club.Exchange of village children during the Summer holidays,staying with French families. Activities include visiting places of interest,shopping,beach activities, discos etc. Main advantages -cultural differences, language,food and tradition. Transport-Plymouth to Roscoff by Brittany Ferries from ferry Terminal at Millbay Docks Plymouth.
